General.Name: Volta Finance Limited
General.Description: Volta Finance Limited is a closed-ended fixed income mutual fund launched and managed by AXA Investment Managers Paris S.A. The fund invests in the fixed income markets of Europe and the United States. It primarily invests in corporate credits, sovereign and quasi-sovereign debt, residential mortgage loans, CDOs, ABS, leveraged loans, automobile loans, and debt interests in infrastructure assets. Volta Finance Limited was formed in December 2006 and is domiciled in the Guernsey, Channel Islands.
General.Address: Tour Majunga La Défense, Paris, France, 92800
